titles.title: Agricultural Export Credit Act of 1993
A bill to amend the Agricultural Trade Act of 1978 to promote the export of agricultural commodities and products to foreign countries, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4281-4282)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Domestic and Foreign Marketing.

committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.subcommittee: Domestic and Foreign Marketing and Product Promotion

bill.summary: 4/1/1993--Introduced. Agricultural Export Credit Act of 1993 - Amends the Agricultural Trade Act of 1978 with regard to the export credit guarantee program to: (1) revise credit worthiness standards; and (2) exempt program shipments from cargo preference requirements.
